location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 5 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Reports detailed information from Persia (via Shaikh Rashed) including news that Ally Morad Cahn [Ali Murad Khan] has entered Schiras [Shiraz]. The letter also details recent correspondence sent and received and recent arrivals and departures from Bushire. Shipped by the Mercury.
